content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Show Lo

This is a list of awards and nominations received by Taiwanese actor and singer Show Lo.
Golden Bell Awards
The Golden Bell Awards () are television production awards presented annually by the Government Information Office (GIO) of the Republic of China (Taiwan) and is Taiwan's equivalent to the Emmy Award.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Year !! # !! width="250"|Category !! width="300"|Nominated work !! Result !! Ref
|-
| 2005 ||40th || rowspan="3"|Best Actor in a Television Series || The Outsiders II || || align="center"|
|-
| 2009  || 44th||Hot Shot||  || align="center"|
|-
| 2010 || 45th|| Hi My Sweetheart ||  || align="center"|
|-
| 2017|| 52nd|| Best Host for a Variety Show || 100% Entertainment ||  || align="center"|
|}
Golden Melody Awards
The Golden Melody Awards () are music production awards presented annually by the Government Information Office of the Republic of China (Taiwan) and is Taiwan's equivalent to the Grammy Awards.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Year !! Number !! width="250"|Category !! width="300"|Nomination !! Result !! Ref
|-
| 2007 || rowspan="1"|18th || Most Popular Male Artist (popular vote) || Show Lo ||  || align="center"|
|}
Hong Kong TVB8 Awards
The Hong Kong TVB8 Awards () are given annually by TVB8, since 1999, a Mandarin television network operated by Television Broadcasts Limited.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Year !! width="250"|Category !! width="350"|Nomination !! Result !! Ref
|-
| 2004 || rowspan=3|Top 10 Gold Songs || "Show Time" from Show Time ||  || align="center"|

|-
| "戀愛達人" (Love Expert) from Expert Show ||  || rowspan=2 align="center"|
|-
| Most Popular Male Artist (China) || Show Lo ||
|-

|-
| "自我催眠" (Self-Hypnosis)  from Hypnosis Show ||
|-
| "飆汗" (Sweating) with Joey Yung from Jump Up – 9492 ||
|-
| rowspan=2|2007 || "精舞門" (Dance Gate) from Speshow ||  || rowspan=2 align="center"|
|-
| "幸福獵人" (Happiness Hunter) from Speshow ||
|}
HITO Radio Music Awards
The HITO Radio Music Awards () are given annually by HITO Radio, the parent company of Taiwanese radio station Hit FM. The order is not specified for the Top 10 Songs of the Year.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Year !! width="250"|Category !! width="380"|Nomination !! Result !! Ref
|-
| rowspan="2"|2007 || Top 10 Songs of the Year || "精舞門" (Dance Gate) from Speshow ||  || rowspan="2" align="center"|
|-
| Most Popular Male Singer (popular Vote) || Show Lo ||
|-
| rowspan="3"|2008 || Top 10 Songs of the Year || "一支獨秀" (One Man Show) from Show Your Dance ||  || rowspan="3" align="center"|
|-
| iSing99 Karaoke Song Award || "我不會唱歌" (I Don't Know How To Sing) from Show Your Dance ||
|-
| Most Popular Male Singer (popular Vote) || Show Lo ||
|-
|2012 || Most Popular Male Singer (popular Vote) || Show Lo ||
|}
IFPI Hong Kong Album Sales Awards
The IFPI Hong Kong Album Sales Awards (), formerly Gold Record Awards (金唱片頒獎典禮) is presented by the Hong Kong branch of International Federation of the Phonographic Industry (IFPI) since 1977. The order is not specified for the Top 10 Selling Mandarin Albums of the Year (十大銷量國語唱片獲獎).
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! width="300"|Category !! width="280"|Nomination !! width="90"|Result !! Ref

|-
| Show On Cruel Stage Concert Live ||
|-
| 2009 || Trendy Man ||  || align="center"|
|-
| 2010 || Rashomon ||  || align="center"|
|-
| 2011 || Only For You ||  || align="center"|
|}
Metro Radio Mandarin Music Awards
The Metro Radio Mandarin Music Awards () are given annually since 2002, by Hong Kong radio station Metro Info. No order of ranking is specified for the Songs of the Year.

Metro Radio Hit Awards
The Metro Radio Hit Awards (), like the Metro Radio Mandarin Music Awards, are given annually (usually in December) by Hong Kong radio station Metro Info. In contrast to the Mandarin Music Awards, the Hit Awards focuses on Cantopop music, and provide a few honours for Mandarin-language music.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Year !! width="280"|Category !! width="350"|Nomination !! Result !! Ref
|-
| rowspan="2"|2005 || Mandarin Singer Grand Prize || Show Lo ||  || rowspan="2" align="center"|
|-
| Singer-Dancer Grand Prize (跳唱歌手大獎) || Show Lo  ||
|-

|-
| Mandarin Song Grand Prize || "一支獨秀" (One Man Show) from Show Your Dance ||
|-
| Singer-Dancer Grand Prize || Show Lo  ||
|}
